titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (H. R. 1827) making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1987, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-198.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 288 - 135 (Record Vote No: 234).

bill.summary: 6/29/1987--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 1827 (supplemental appropriations). Deems the conference report and amendments in disagreement as having been read when called up for consideration.
